all_tweet.text: 1/ Anime 2.0 is here, and it’s not just another NFT play. AnimeChain is live, avatar wearables have dropped, and Episode 2 is out on YouTube. Sticker NFTs can now be bought with $ANIME. L2 checkout is here, and L3 + fiat payments are coming soon.

1/ @BagsApp  is making moves. Just launched their Points program, rewarding traders 1 point per $1 traded—retroactive for all beta users. These points convert to $BAGS tokens later, with mining continuing until $100M in trading volume. Solid fundamentals, strong incentives.

1/ 🧵 Latest on Jupiter $JUP
Jupiter's making waves with $143M daily volume and $1.83B market cap, currently at $0.69. Their JLP is proving solid product-market fit as a natural yield source. Big moves ahead with a buyback program using 50% of protocol fees + 3yr lock.… https://t.co/SkIuyMbe9R

• $BERA peaked at $14.83 on launch day feb 6
• established strong tvl foundation hitting $3.27b after pol activation
• currently sitting at $7.50 with healthy… https://t.co/JaThXpwLdw

wallet registration through discord. mainnet deployment confirmed for current market conditions.

$PLUME mainnet confirmed for March. BitVM bridge integration unlocks native BTC flows to power RWA infrastructure. currently at $0.14

multiple govt officials engaging with content.

Looking undervalued here at $1.6M mcap. https://t.co/G5mcr2uJM7 https://t.co/4QZfNJXIMm
